website_summaries.verdict: With a unique ventilated, gel-infused construction, this multitasking memory foam pillow is a solid option for warm climates or if you simply can't sleep without a cool pillow.
pros: Solid gel-infused memory foam with ventilation cutouts provides supportive pressure relief and fantastic cooling performance
Medium loft is suitable for all sleeping positions
Plush cover is removable and machine washable
Firm enough for therapeutic use without being overly stiff or uncomfortable
cons: If you prefer extra loft, the medium height might disappoint
Needs to be aired before use

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this pillow to replace some old memory foam pillows and liked the reviews it got. I just received them and followed the instructions to unroll them and let them sit for 24 hours. They were soft and had no noticeable smell so it seemed like they were perfect... until I noticed a few spots on them and thought maybe it was lint or a little dirt. Wrong... they were little worm like bugs on both pillows... some still alive and moving around! I understand this is probably just a rare occurrence but it is unacceptable. I have attached pictures of the pillows where you can see the bugs
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Pietras

customer_reviews.title: So this pillow is comfy and provides just enough support ...
customer_reviews.text: So this pillow is comfy and provides just enough support but is also soft and comfy. However it cam in a damaged boxed and there are yellow stains on it and little lint balls all over it and it wasn’t even in a plastic bag inside the box. It looks very used. I’m just grossed out by the whole thing considering I’m supposed to sleep on it. Decent pillow but makes you wonder where it’s coming from. Yuck
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the reviews were pretty good. My experience was not not great. It's just an "ok" pillow. This is a very low end memory foam pillow. It is comfortable for the most part, but could be a bit thicker. I've owned a few memory foam pillows & this is the cheapest feeling one. It's better than those cheap $5-10 pillows at a store, but not worth the $35 I paid for this. You can definitely find a better product for this price.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Got what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Just received the pillow and so far so good. I received what I expected based. It expanded to size in a few seconds. The ‘new’ smell on the pillow is the only temporary downside so I’m going to let it air outside before sleeping on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Turned out to be like the rest
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited when this pillow came. I really did experience decreased back pain once I started using it! However, after having it a little over a month it’s getting flat and not feel as good as before. I’m not so sure it was worth the money and I bought two. One I hardly use so now I’m alternating between pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Newman

customer_reviews.title: No GEL
customer_reviews.text: For something that’s called a “gel memory foam pillow”, it has NO gel. Description says 100% polyurethane foam. Maybe that blue color is intended to make up for lack of cool gel.
customer_reviews.author: PlayRight

customer_reviews.title: This is the best pillow I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pillow I’ve ever owned. The foam is soft, but firm enough to provide more than adequate support for my neck. I suffer from a lot of neck and lower back pain, and this pillow has helped me sleep so much better. I keep a pillowcase on mine, but have at times taken the pillow’s cover off and washed it with my pillowcases for thorough cleaning. It is a little difficult to shimmie the cover back over the foam pillow, but that’s not necessarily a bad thing because it means the cover hugs the pillow well and is basically unnoticeable under a pillowcase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B.

customer_reviews.title: Soft & No support
customer_reviews.text: Let the pillow air out for 2 days like the instructions said, but it barely made a difference. Super soft but no firmness whatsoever for a side sleeper; my head melted right through it as soon as i laid on it, making it very painful on my arms. Might be OK for a back sleeper, maybe? Absolutely flabbergasted by some of the other reviews here. Did they buy a different pillow?
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: What’s Not To Love ??
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of the gel memory pillows. I first saw this type of pillow at a large mattress retail store. The price was $100 per pillow. I found this product and absolutely love this pillow. It is so comfortable whether I sleep on my back or side. The pillow is firm but also seems to cradle my head. The pillows have retained their original shape and feel. I was worried that they would give off heat since they are memory foam, but there is no extra heat, etc. This second purchase is for the guest room so my guests feel extra comfort while visiting. I have only the highest recommendation to purchase these pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding pillow for the best sleep experience!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing pillow! It came in a fairly small box and plumped up nicely. I am a side sleeper and this pillow supports my neck and head so comfortably. The first night with my new Weekender ventilated memory-foam pillow was the best sleep in a long while. I need a couple more of these!
customer_reviews.author: smppetheads

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product in the box
customer_reviews.text: The product that I received was not the correct pillow in the box - and I ordered three. There was no gel, the foam had no memory, and it didn't come with a washable cover.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Just bought a second pillow for a friend and she too loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Update to my review- one and 1/2 months later, still loving this pillow. I bought one for a friend and she also loves it now. I too had bought every pillow on the market over the years and this one is certainly the most comfortable, most cooling and best support yet. This is what a pillow should do! Cradle and support your head. My first thought was it wasn’t high enough and wouldn’t feel comfortable. Boy was I wrong. The second my head hit this pillow, I realized what I have been missing all along. True support. I absolutely love this pillow and highly recommend it. It also manages to stay cool, which at my age is priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirby and Casey’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: SO comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is everything I had hoped for......had a memory foam pillow that needed to be replaced after several years of use. Decided to take a chance on this one, and am very pleased that I did! It is so very comfortable with support that is just right. There were some complaints about an odor that existed, but I did as the instructions suggested and left it outside on our porch for several hours, and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: K T

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this pillow. When I first got it I thought it would be too soft, but it's not! It's got a lot of give, but it supports right where I need it. I've only had it a couple months, so we'll see what happens in a couple more. It doesn't stay as cool as I expected (which is the reason for the 4 stars). I don't get hot, but it's not as cool as it seemed to indicate it would be.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Olmstead

customer_reviews.title: Goes flat and does not offer much support,
customer_reviews.text: Goes flat and does not offer much support, returning it after a couple weeks of stiff necks and headaches every day
customer_reviews.author: t. m. u.

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve spent maybe 10 bucks on a pillow before and thought that I’d splurge and get a nice pillow this time. I always end up with a lot pain in the morning and this pillow is amazing! the true test is sleeping on it . It’s soft but ur head is still lifted . I bought one for my husband and my self. I recommend it so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your a small person like myself 5’0” with neck problems. This pillow isn’t for you
customer_reviews.text: I have neck issues: herniated disc and degenerative joint disease, so I have searched and searched for a comfortable pillow that will allow me to sleep comfortably and wake up without neck pain. This is not the pillow for me! I’m a side sleeper and this pillow doesn’t give me the support I need. It doesn’t allow my spine proper alignment. So, I’m still searching for the perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jordon

customer_reviews.title: GOES COMPLETELY FLAT AFTER PUTTING HEAD ON IT.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time and money. Not worth $1 dollar. Returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: OC

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect pillow for years! I just found it. It’s the perfect balance, not to soft not to hard. I am side sleeper, I am able to place my arm under the pillow and “hold” it while I sleep. My daughter tired my husbands pillow while he was out of town and I just ordered a 3rd pillow. The pillow molds to your neck no matter how you sleep. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Best memory foam pillow I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I had an expensive department store memory foam pillow I was replacing so I was skeptical about this one since it was so cheap. OMG... I LOVE this pillow. It is so much better. It's soft, conforms to my head easily and provides support for my neck (which is important since I have neck problems). I generally sleep in every position and this pillow works for all of them. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was great for the first 2 nights. Assumibly the "break in period". After that it was terribly soft and caused a lot of shoulder and neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P.

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff, not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. It's too firm. I have neck problems and was hoping this would be a more squishy pillow, but its not it sits pretty high and leaves a kink in your neck.. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Coconutty

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this pillow just wasn't comfortable. It didn't hit the neck or head in a comfortable way and the quality was lacking. I wish I had returned. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Adjustable, Best Pillow Ever
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was a little thinner than I expected, but I'm finding that it is more pliable because of that. As a side sleeper, I like my pillow to hit my face in a certain way and I find I can easily adjust it so I'm very comfortable. Update After almost a year of use, I find this pillow to be just as comfortable as it was when I purchased it. In fact, I am now purchasing a second one to I have two of the same pillows on my bed. I was concerned at first about outgassing but all smell was gone within a couple of weeks. I heartily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CharmY2K

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Now!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is amazing. I did a lot of research and read a lot of reviews before selecting a pillow. I'm so pleased that I chose this one. I absolutely love it. It does have a strong odor at first - just purchase a pillow protector with a zipper and that solves the problem. I smell my pillowcase to fall asleep so I am particularly sensitive to odors on my pillow and after the first night, the odor was completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow - poor temperature regulation and air circulation
customer_reviews.text: The pillow take about a minute to warm to skin temperature, so the claims about "Infused with temperature regulating gel" and claims about "Ventilated design maximizes air circulation" appear misleading... perhaps my body just can't feel it because it's so subtle??? The pillow works well otherwise - great support for a side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So stinky!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows were so stinky!!! After opening and letting them fill up from being compressed, I couldn’t lay on it for more than 5 minutes, it reeked so bad!!!!!! Gave me a terrible headache!!! Don’t recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Miller22

customer_reviews.title: Soft but too high.
customer_reviews.text: It felt like my neck was just too high up. Very soft material. Minimal smell.
customer_reviews.author: Turk

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it was.
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow because of all the reviews but With a name like memory gel I was expecting something a bit denser and heavier. What I recurved was a seriously light weight pillow that did not give me much support. Some people will like that, I was looking for something heavier that cradled my head not that felt like I wasn’t sleeping with a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W.

customer_reviews.title: Not a heavy pillow and doesn't stay cool
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is not a good quality it's light doesn't stay cool and there is no support it goes flat fast
customer_reviews.author: REMI556

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Pillow was great during the first 2-3 weeks then I noticed it began to get softer to the point where it does not provide any neck support for me leaving me neck in pain in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Vegeta

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with neck or migraine issues
customer_reviews.text: The worst flatest expensive pillow i have every purchased for my neck. I had them on my master bed. For two weeks before i just gave up and moved them to my guest rm so I would not have to send them back. No support. Not firm in any temp.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jeffery Bland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a sore/stiff neck
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the comfort and support this pillow gives my neck. I have had major surgery on my neck and have rods and plates in my neck. This pillow offered support and adjusted to my necks specific needs while I slept. I never thought that a pillow could offer both support and ventilation for a good night sleep. I definitely will be replacing my other pillows with this model!!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Too soft  stiff neck pain
customer_reviews.text: First night using this pillow woke up in morning with stiffness in my neck not worth the buy way too soft felt like a baby pillow
customer_reviews.author: Tal Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressive
customer_reviews.text: I read a positive review on this so I was interested in buying it. The price point was high so I thought that was a lot behind the product. But it’s basically a piece of foam and nothing much else I returned it right away.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGann

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Smell: We bought two of these and they came with a terrible memory foam / chemical smell. Unbearable. Kept them outside to air them out for more than a month and the smell is still there, even though it's getting more and more subtle as weeks go by. Support: Not nearly as firm and supportive as we are used to. Look: They look pretty good. Not completely horrible but we would not buy them again nor would we recommend them to anyone (sad to say this - I'm not one to be giving bad reviews just because). We don't feel like we got our money's worth. We did not return them because we don't have the time.
customer_reviews.author: MSS

customer_reviews.title: Killing my neck. Isnt cooling anything.
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get these new pillows. I have a firm memory foam bed that came with 2 pillows that are find but I wanted the cooling pillow of better quality. I let them puff up for over 48hours. I didn't care for the smell so I didn't use them at first. After 2weeks my boyfriend has started using his as a knee pillow and I have increased neck pains so I have thrown it in the pile of pillows we don't use. Maybe it will be fine in the guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Clark

customer_reviews.title: smell very bad like chemical
customer_reviews.text: smell very bad like chemical. I have had the pillow for one month but it is still smelled very bad. I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the hottest pillow I've ever had. It also is too soft. Almost like a cheap pillow from Walmart. I gave it to my son. It made me sweat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED my husbands Snoring!! Love it 😍
customer_reviews.text: Love this Incredible thing!! I got it for my husband who has back issues. We already have a mem-foam mattress topper but we’re accustomed to pillows and need extra support. This wonder pillow STOPPED my husbands Snoring!! It’s amazing! And he slept through the night! I’m going to get one for myself, it’s eases my neck and shoulder tension/tenderness. I have zero negative remarks! Buy it! 🤩
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Literally the best
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I read the reviews because it convinced me to get this pillow. I at first was a little skeptical on how great could a pillow actually be? I was used to sleeping on thinner pillows because generally thicker pillows were uncomfortable. I was having trouble sleeping and would always wake up with a kink in my neck, so I decided to look for a new pillow to see if that would help my sleepless nights. This pillow is literally a game changer, and so glad about how affordable it is as well! It took about a week for me to get used to it, but now I cant imagine sleeping with any other pillow. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too firm.
customer_reviews.text: It’s light but so firm. Not comfortable at all. Tried to give it a real chance and break it in. Would love to return it, but waited too long
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: not great, horrible smell.
customer_reviews.text: Its been about 2 weeks since i bought these, I believe I must have gotten a defective product because the smell does not leave and they are pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I definitely sleep better
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. I can rant and rave on it but the next person may feel completely different on it. I will say I have caught the flu and woke up drenched in sweat and upon removing the cover to wash it, the pillow itself had a chunk missing and seems it would be easy to rip apart. Replacing the cover, I can’t even notice it, though. It did have a smell when opening but if you do as instructed and let it sit and form, it comes to size and the smell dissipates. I’m no longer rolling pillows to double the size of them anymore and that’s a huge benefit for me and how I sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is comfortable, however, there is a weird chemical smell that actual got me quite nauseous.
customer_reviews.author: ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: After searching high & low for the perfect pillow for me, I have found it. Firm, supportive & not too lofty. My neck has never been happier. It "poufed" up right out of the box. I allowed it to breathe outside in the sun & breeze. It's fantastic. Foam is unfortunately not unscented so I popped it in the dryer on low with some dryer sheets. The smell is relatively mild & unnoticeable. I will order more!!
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: you will love it
customer_reviews.text: we were furniture shopping and my son found one of these pillows, Bobs Discount Furniture wanted $100. I found this one on Amazon, it's is like sleeping with your head on a cloud. Now I need to order more for everyone in the house. Well worth the money I paid
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for about 1-2 mths then no good
customer_reviews.text: So I've now had this pillow since the beginning of January...at first I thought I had found an answer to my sleepless nights and constant neck and shoulder pain. I was wrong sadly. I reached out to the company and explained that the pillow doesn't seem to support my neck like it originally had, that was 2 or so months ago. They wanted pictures of the pillow in which I questioned because I told them it doesn't LOOK different it FEELS different! I sent the pictures to be told that there was no reason for an exchange. Which I knew they would say because again it DOESN'T LOOK DIFFERENT IT FEELS DIFFERENT! Would NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely disappointed in this product. Was excited to use it because I have been having sleep pain, but I got the pillow and it was full of hair and look like it had already been used. Very disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Don't
customer_reviews.text: Terrible pillow, much too stiff and wrecked mine and my husbands neck/upper back. I bought them based on reviews, and regret it. I purchased a 2 pack for $40 and they are so much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Too high for a side sleeper, foam to squishy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this pillow because I thought it would be similar to my TULO brand pillow, which I love, but TULO does not come in a king size. Both the TULO and this pillow claim to have a 5 inch loft so I expected them to be similar. it’s comfortable enough for a back sleeper but it is too high for a side sleeper, in my opinion. Also, this pillow sinks under the weight of my head, the foam is just a lighter weight. The TULO pillow is very dense and heavy. Foam density is a difference you can’t appreciate until you actually have the pillow at home. This pillow is pretty squishy.
customer_reviews.author: BPBomber

customer_reviews.title: Finally, the perfect pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow offers amazing and reliable support and comfort, and always glides back to its original shape in a second or two. You would be amazed by how many pillows I've tried. I'm not especially picky, but nearly all pillows seem to break down quickly, offer zero support, and you spend all night fighting with them. This pillow snaps into shape and fully forms in less than 10 seconds out of the box. I immediately put a pillow case on it and used it the same night. Slight rubbery odor for a couple of days, but nothing horrible. The only pillow I've had that ever came close to this good cost me nearly $100.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID W.

customer_reviews.title: My mom liked my pillow so much that she had me buy her and my dad one.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this pillow. I would say that one of the only downsides is that wearing my huge headphones is slightly awkward with the pillow because you sink into it a bit. Everyone that has felt or used my pillow has really liked it and I sleep very well with it. It was definitely worth the price although some people might call you crazy for buying a pillow for this much. My mom and I have the standard size and my dad has the queen size and we all prefer to sleep with these pillows over any other pillows in the house. I used to use 2 pillow but honestly I only need this one now.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This pillow goes flat from the heat of your body. Did not support my neck where I have an injury at C-2. I should have sent it back but didn't realized could have until it was too late, past the refund period.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this pillow
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. I’m a back sleeper with arthritis in my hips and lower spine, so comfort is critical to me trying to sleep. This pillow has just the right amount of support and has kept its loft with no lumpiness or flattening. It did have a strong odor when I opened the package, but they recommend washing the cover first. I washed and dried the cover as well as putting the pillow out in the fresh air and sunshine for a couple of hours. Once the cover was back on, no odor. Just perfect support. And a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Em's

customer_reviews.title: Does not cool!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow does not cool at all. It looks and feels like a bag stuffed with toilet paper
customer_reviews.author: JaimeJ258

customer_reviews.title: For "memory" foam, this pillow doesn't exactly dwell on the past.
customer_reviews.text: This did not help at all to keep me from waking up with tension headaches from a sore neck. The texture of this thing is probably not what you're imagining when you think of memory foam. Memory foam usually leaves an indentation where you place pressure, which slowly springs back up. This pillow, instead, springs back instantly with no "memory" at all. It's got too much rebound, and resultingly feels stiff. Memory foam feels like laying your head on a cloud. This foam gives the same "support" as laying on a tight garbage bag full of crumpled up paper.
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm and Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Based on the positive reviews I decided to give this pillow a try. It is not what I expected. The memory foam is hard and clearly lower quality. It is uncomfortable regardless of what position you sleep in. There is almost no give and does not conform to the contours of your head as you would expect from a memory foam pillow. I wake up to a stiff neck every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: My old memory foam pillow does not do well in winter with the colder and dryer air it can become hard as a rock! It was starting to bother my neck so when I saw this pillow on a lightening deal I thought i would try it. It amused me greatly that it came in a box and then inflated to full pillow size. I had no trouble with a smell of any sort and I have been sleeping on it nightly with no problems for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: tonimariep

customer_reviews.title: Soft...and hot
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reasonably firm pillow with some support. This is NOT that pillow. It's extremely soft and gets really warm while you sleep. It's not a soft as a feather pillow but in that range. I will continue my hunt.
customer_reviews.author: Battledad

customer_reviews.title: Just a a great, no-nonsense pillow
customer_reviews.text: Very cushy but also oddly supportive. Good for side, back, and stomach sleepers--I alternate constantly and my neck pain has dissipated since I started using this pillow. There are probably better pillows for people who only sleep in one position, I guess, but this one's hard to beat for folks who tend toward restlessness and lots of position changing. I also appreciate that it isn't filled with shredded foam, which is just a cheap way to reuse excess foam from solid material products.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Tulien

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you are looking for a cooling pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for the sheer fact that it claimed to be a cooling pillow. I was sadly disappointed as it is no different from any of the other pillows I own which did NOT cost me almost $50. Since I used it for a few nights, it didn't feel right retirning it. Complete waist of money, if that's what you are looking. In terms of comfort, I have no complaints, which is why I gave it 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: F.Nel

customer_reviews.title: OK if you sleep on your side
customer_reviews.text: I bought this foam pillow to use in an RV, and am Comparing it to a Tempur-Pedic foam pillow that I normally use, which cost over twice as much. Compared to the Tempur-Pedic this pillow is lighter in weight, the same thickness but firmer. It rebounds quicker when you depress it and seems not the quality of memory foam of the Tempur-Pedic. It seems OK when I lay on my side but too thick when I lay on my back, because it does not compress quite enough. Compared to the Tempur_Pedic it is probably three stars but because it was much cheaper I gave it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: I think I'm too hot for this pillow
customer_reviews.text: Well, I got it to keep my head and in turn my body cooler at night and it does neither... Update-January 2019 Although it doesn't keep me cool it does retain it's fluff. I bought a $5 pillow from Walmart a year ago and this pillow is still as fluffy as the day I got it, so I have it one start back because of that. It still doesn't keep me cool but it keeps me comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Keeps its shape
customer_reviews.text: I read the the other reviews before buying this pillow and have to admit was worried but it was the one I wanted because of the foam and I have neck pain with headaches at night. When I opened the packing I did it on the floor and was pleased to see no bugs and no yellowing on the pillow. I got a great one. I've been using it for a few months now and still am enjoying every bit of it. To me it's not too firm and definitly lets me get a great night sleep. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lonibugg

customer_reviews.title: unhappy :(
customer_reviews.text: work good for the first 2 months after that i started waking up with neck pain
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Catalan

customer_reviews.title: Love this— it’s a real memory foam pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased many memory foam pillows- they all were horrendous jokes. When I opened this pillow, I thought, “ oh great, another dud!” But them I got it opened and it started opening up. A couple hours later is me back, felt it and FINALLY! A real honest to goodness memory foam pillow. I love this thing! I left my other one in a hotel on vacation and wanted to cry! I’m ordering another one. My first was the original sleep innovations classical , this is just as good - Finally! No smell at all either!
customer_reviews.author: Lovinglife

customer_reviews.title: Bought for neck pain
customer_reviews.text: Been having major issues with neck and shoulder pain after a night of "trying to sleep", so I figured it was time to try a new pillow. This one had great reviews and was reasonably priced, so I thought I would give it a try. It really hasnt helped at all for neck pain (at least for me), but it does hold my head in a more neutral incline. Its a lot more firm than I thought it would be, which I dont think I am a fan of. The pillow itself is really great quality, though. and if you like firm pillows, this may be a good option!
customer_reviews.author: Mehgan R.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NOT a cool pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned mine for a year, and I absolutely sweat into this pillow. I will typically wake up in the middle of the night to find the neck area just wet with sweat. I have to flip the pillow to get back to sleep. We have central air set at 77 degrees in the summer. Also, i'm not a big, heavy guy or anything... just normal average weight. I am beginning to think that there is no such thing as a COOL memory foam pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Talk about A GOOD NIGHT sleep
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow for my gf and brother for Christmas and it has been even more than I could ask for. It’s great for support, comfort, durability and consistency. This pillow is far more than I thought it would be considering I had intentions of originally getting another temper-pedic pillow, but no need to spend the extra coin. I would recommend this pillow OVER the pedic. All that being said I’m probably getting another for my mother and myself some time this month. Hope you enjoyed reading!
customer_reviews.author: Jalin

customer_reviews.title: Like a brick
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good pillow. Very hard. Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Airy & Plush - like a down pillow
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and MANY of them stated that this pillow was either "firm" or "firm, but soft with support". This pillow isn't for me. I was looking for a firm and denseb but doughy pillow that provided the right support for my neck as I am a forever side sleeper. I love my memory foam mattress topper as it is dense, firm, supportive, and has a slow rise. So trying to find a pillow version. THIS PILLOW: Airy, lightweight, plush, keeps neutral temp (not hot or cold on your head when you sleep). Is say this pillow is perfect for people who love soft and cushy pillows that their head sinks into with little support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was not at all a fan of this pillow. Not comfortable at all. Just returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: LesleeG

customer_reviews.title: Lacking thickness / firmness
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to be thicker/firmer to support my neck. Not good for a side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting support and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I‘be had my pill now for several months. I’ve gone through a lot of pillows over the years but this is my favorite. I always stack them double high and currently use a very thin Tempur-pedic pillow as the base as it’s very dense are use this pillow on top. It’s so comfortable and it’s soft yet supportive. When I sleep on my side it doesn’t hurt my ears. I often wake up on my back using just this pillow and I’m still so comfortable. The pillow doesn’t get hot from body heat. I do highly recommend this pillow for its comfort and durability.
customer_reviews.author: lisa bauer

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is amazing! I’ve tried other memory foam pillows and non are as comfortable as this one. I had really bad shoulder pain because I sleep weird with my arm under my pillow. After I bought this pillow my pain went away and hasn’t come back. I just ordered another for my hubby since he liked mine so much. And now several friends have ordered per my recommendation and they are obsessed as well!! Do yourself a favor and buy the pillow! Better yet to but wait when they are on sale. You can get them for $30 instead of $50 put it in your cart and wait for email price updates!
customer_reviews.author: Tera Allridge

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This pillow does not "give" at all. VERY firm. Would return it but, thinking it would be fine, I tossed packaging. :(
customer_reviews.author: gammatee

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pretty hot sleeper, always have been. I've been actively looking for a good cooling pillow for the past decade and have gone through more than I care to admit. My last one was most of the way there, but they didn't make a king sized version. I was initially hesitant upon opening this pillow, because it's a lot lighter than my current queen sized cooling foam pillow. Well, my concerns were unfounded. It supports very well, stays cool all night long, and the lightness makes it easier to flip over in the middle of the night half asleep. Very, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill of Rights

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this pillow at all costs
customer_reviews.text: This pillow comes as shown. There is no inner fabric covering on the foam pillow itself, making the supplied pillow cover next to impossible to get back on the pillow after removing it for washing. For this reason I have given it the lowest possible rating. If you never plan to wash the cover, this pillow is very nice and reasonably priced. The smell is not the worst of the many foam pillows I have tried over the years, but the lack of an open weave inner covering is inexcusable!!!
customer_reviews.author: martinJ

customer_reviews.title: Smells really bad
customer_reviews.text: While the pillow is soft and cool to the touch, it has this HORRIBLE chemical smell to it that hasn't gone away despite airing it outside for days. I missed the return window so I am stuck with it, but I'll be looking to buy a different pillow elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A longlasting pillow
customer_reviews.text: I'd say this pillow runs right in the middle between a super high quality luxury pillow and an economical one. I mean that as a compliment as many high end pillows are simply ridiculously too much money for what you get and cheap ones never last. It's just what I've been looking for. It seems a few got pillows that were improperly stored or packaged. That was not the case for me as mine came in pristine condition. There a mild smell that I would pick up sometimes at night when it was new, but that has now faded away. It still keeps its form and supports my head in just the perfect way.
customer_reviews.author: A. Landers

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow one year ago. I'm buying a second to have matching pillows on my bed. I use a CPAP and purchased a pillow recommended CPAP users. After having neck problems, I switched back to the WEEKENDER pillow. It's so much more comfortable and I'm sleeping so much better. I'm a back and side sleeper, this pillow is the best I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: D. Berger

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable!! I had some girls staying with me for a girls weekend and everyone went home and bought these pillows. I had a tough time with finding a pillow that was soft/comfy enough without being too “thick” that the pillow is so high up and hurt my neck. This is the perfect balance of flatness while still being comfortable and soft. It also is very cool. If you touch it outside of the pillow case it is cold to the touch. You can see the “bumps” on the pillow through my pillowcases (you might not have this issue if you have thicker pillow cases) but it doesn’t bother me because the pillows are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a consistent quality product
customer_reviews.text: Not a consistent product, 1st pillow is good still using it. 2nd one purchased month later very uncomfortable. had to return it
customer_reviews.author: S.Y

customer_reviews.title: What I love most about this pillow is the way it supports ...
customer_reviews.text: What I love most about this pillow is the way it supports your neck and head without feeling like you are sleeping on a solid memory foam pillow. There is the perfect amount of give when you lay on it whether you are laying on your side, back or stomach. The high quality casing around the pillow is soft to the touch and there is little to no smell when first opening it! This is an excellent pillow if you are currently experiencing neck and shoulder pain and need a little extra support.
customer_reviews.author: Damian P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow.
customer_reviews.text: The comfiest pillow I’ve ever used! Had this pillow for over a year now and it still is like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: A pillow is all personal preference, so I can only speak for myself but I found this pillow to be incredibly firm and unforgiving. That being said, it seems well made and of high quality for the price. If you want a very firm and somewhat high pillow you’d enjoy this. I’m more of a medium firm guy and after trying 3 other pillows I’ve settled on the Coop adjustable (loving it).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!!! Fixed neck issues at night!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start?!! I have had neck/back issues for 19 years. I have genetically fused vertebrae in my neck and bulge slip in S1/L4 so I'm no stranger to sleepless nights. I read through some other reviews. And there was one that stood out in regards to having neck pain and trying this pillow. I am so glad I did! The last four nights I've gotten the best sleep I have gotten in the last 4 years. I was Leary that the pillow would not be high enough or too soft but it's actually a perfect fit and allows me to side sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Box was  filled with carpenter ants!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this pillow for neck support, as I have trouble sleeping at night. I was very excited for it to arrive when it came I opened it only to find the box was filled with hundreds of carpenter ants! Big black carpenter ants and I'm talking like hundreds! Scared the living crap out of me. I'm using the pillow it's not super awesome but it's okay but now I'm all sketched out about the ants! I took pictures I'm trying to add them but it won't let me. If anyone knows how to add pictures let me know I'm clicking on the photo button and it's not allowing me to and it's not doing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Ellis

customer_reviews.title: great foam pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow already had a different foam pillow and love them so i decided to order another pillow off amazon.com. Great pillow comes in a small box rolled up and within mins becomes a nice comfortable pillow. Wanted another foam pillow but didnt want to pay a ton of money for one. You dont need an expensive foam pillow this one was a good price and is very comfortable. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Aleavitt49

customer_reviews.title: No need to pay a fortune for the name brand hyped pillows
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pillow at a great price. Was not happy with the expensive name brand pillows I bought so tried these and these are much better. Great for all positions but probably best for side sleepers due to the wider loft. Very soft and very light, don't feel like bricks like some memory foam pillows. My expensive ones are now in the closet. One small issue is the pillows are somewhat sticky likely due to the infused gel so once you take it out of the cover to wash you'll have a job putting it back in without damaging it since they are quite fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Trance

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for a person with neck problems.
customer_reviews.text: For a memory foam pillow it's not comfortable at all. Tried it for a week and had know comfort at all. Would not recommend it for someone with neck problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous when purchasing this pillow. It had some mixed reviews. The smell went away pretty quickly. Its a little too supportive for me. I like a little more give in my pillow but that's just a personal preference. I do however, use it to sleep and it has improved my comfort level significantly. It's a great price for a pretty good product. I didn't want to spend an arm and a leg on something that's going to be maybe 10% better than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: I do not under stand all the rave reviews of these pillows. They are very ridgid they DO NOT conform to my head or my Arms. One Reviewer stated its perfect for him because he is a side sleeper and it conforms to his arm under his pillow, This could not be farther from the truth. They are horrible when I slept on my side and ok when I slept on my back. These Pillows are not Soft or Medium. They are FIRM and hardly conform to your Head, consider this when buying these. I am going back to my Goose Down Pillows.
customer_reviews.author: southshore74

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: It has no support at all. You lay on it and your head sinks all the way to the bed
customer_reviews.author: DJ S.

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam pillow is the best!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying a memory foam pillow, and... Why didn't I purchase it earlier? I had some trouble sleeping and needed to change something so I purchased this pillow after reading several reviews. My head rests perfectly, and it's so much better than regular pillow. Even though I only used it for couple of days, I like that it still maintains its shape an is still firm. It's like firm sand, I wouldn't recommend it if you don't like a firm pillow.
customer_reviews.author: GYC

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! It's so comfortable! I'm usually extremely picky when it come to pillows and as soon as I used this one I knew it was perfect! It molds to your head and neck really well and it stays pretty cool! I've noticed that it's firmer when my room is colder, which I'm sure has something to do with the gel. (I tend to have my room extremely cold when i sleep) I mention this because many people seem to be asking about how firm it is. I'm very very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Goes flat in only a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for less than 3 months before it went flat. I liked it while it lasted. For a fairly expensive pillow I expect it to last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: User1

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about these as first because I like very soft pillows, and thus have never particularly enjoyed memory foam pillows. These changed my mind. They are perfect for me. They support while still allowing me to feel like I'm sinking into a cloud. I've had no problems with them being too warm either. They did have a bit of a smell at first, but it dissipated within a week. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: musicmaker

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for the price. Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one and then my wife had to have her own. Perfect pillow! I used to have to use 2 pillows and now I just use one. A little firm but it takes shape to your head and face quickly. Has a slightly off smell the first day or so but went away completely now. Love that it has a cover with it too. All my other pillows would wear out quickly also. Wish I would of purchased one of these sooner. Would of saved a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: WEEKENDER Ventilated Gel Memory Foam Pillow - Washable Cover - Standard Size
feature_bullets: Soft, yet supportive CertiPUR US certified memory foam provides superior pressure relief and comfort
Infused with temperature regulating gel for more comfortable sleep conditions
Removable cover is machine washable; Standard size, mid loft pillow measures 16 inches by 25 inches with a 5 inch loft
Firmer than traditional down or down alternative; 3 year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars6,942 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Weekender Gel Memory Foam Pillow, Standard
